00028 class userManager {
00029         var $db;
00030 
00031         function userManager ($db) {
00032                 $this->db = $db;
00033         }
00034         
00035         /*Public functions*/
00036         /*User functions*/
00037         
00044         function newUser () {
00045                 $allOptions = $this->getAllOptionsForUser ();
00046                 if (! isError ($allOptions)) {
00047                         return new user ($this->db, $allOptions);
00048                 } else {
00049                         return $allOptions;
00050                 }
00051         }       
00052         
00060         function loginIsRegistered ($login) {
00061                 $sql = "SELECT COUNT(login) FROM {$this->db->getPrefix ()}users WHERE login='$login'";
00062                 $q = $this->db->query ($sql);
00063                 if (! isError ($q)) {
00064                         $row = $this->db->fetchArray ($q);
00065                         if ($row['COUNT(login)'] == 0) {
00066                                 return false;
00067                         } else {
00068                                 return true;
00069                         }
00070                 } else {
00071                         return $q;
00072                 }
00073         }
00074         
00082         function emailIsRegistered ($email) {
00083                 $sql = "SELECT COUNT(email) FROM {$this->db->getPrefix ()}users WHERE email='$email'";
00084                 $q = $this->db->query ($sql);
00085                 if (! isError ($q)) {
00086                         $row = $this->db->fetchArray ($q);
00087                         if ($row['COUNT(email)'] == 0) {
00088                                 return false;
00089                         } else {
00090                                 return true;
00091                         }
00092                 } else {
00093                         return $q;
00094                 }
00095         }
00096         
00104         function addUserToDatabase ($user) {
00105                 $lIR = $this->loginIsRegistered ($user->getLogin ()); 
00106                 if ($lIR == false) {
00107                         $eIR = $this->emailIsRegistered ($user->getEmail ()); 
00108                         if ($eIR == false) {
00109                                 return $user->addToDatabase ();
00110                         } else {
00111                                 if (! isError ($eIR)) {
00112                                         return "ERROR_USERMANAGER_EMAIL_EXISTS {$user->getEmail ()}";
00113                                 } else {
00114                                         return $eIR;
00115                                 }
00116                         }
00117                 } else {
00118                         if (! isError ($lIR)) {
00119                                 return "ERROR_USERMANAGER_LOGIN_EXISTS {$user->getLogin ()}";
00120                         } else {
00121                                 return $lIR;
00122                         }
00123                 }
00124         }
00125         
00133         function removeUserFromDatabase ($user) {
00134                 return $user->removeFromDatabase ();
00135         }
00136         
00152         function addOptionToUser ($newOption, $sqlType) {
00153                 $curOptions = $this->getAllOptionsForUser ();
00154                 if (! isError ($curOptions)) {
00155                         if (array_key_exists ($newOption, $curOptions)) {
00156                                 $sql = "ALTER TABLE {$this->db->getPrefix()}users ADD $newOption $sqlType";
00157                                 $q = $this->db->query ($sql);
00158                                 if (isError ($q)) {
00159                                         return $q;
00160                                 }
00161                         } else {
00162                                 return "ERROR_USERMNAGER_OPTION_FORUSER_EXISTS $newOption";
00163                         }
00164                 } else {
00165                         return $curOptions;
00166                 }
00167         }
00168         
00174         function getAllOptionsForUser () {
00175                 $fields = $this->db->getAllFields ($this->db->getPrefix ().'users');
00176                 if (! isError ($fields)) {
00177                         $allOptions = array ();
00178                         foreach ($fields as $field) {
00179                                 if (! ($field == 'userID' or $field == 'login' or $field == 'email')) {
00180                                         $allOptions[$field] = null;
00181                                 }
00182                         }
00183                         return $allOptions;
00184                 } else {
00185                         return $fields;
00186                 }
00187         }
00188 
00189         function getAllUsers () {
00190         }
00191 
00198         function getAllUsersID () {
00199                 $sql = "SELECT userID FROM {$this->db->getPrefix ()}users";
00200                 $q = $this->db->query ($sql);
00201                 if (! isError ($q)) {
00202                         $allUsers = array ();
00203                         while ($row = $this->db->fetchArray ($q)) {
00204                                 $allUsers[] = $row['userID'];
00205                         }
00206                         return $allUsers;
00207                 } else {
00208                         return $q;
00209                 }
00210         }
